name: SpriteWarrior
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 36
Theme was Ancient Technology

Based off of Maori Mythology:
You have enraged Punga (ancestor of all ugly things) and has sent creatures to chase and kill you.

It is up to you to reach the end using the right tools

Warning: Because of the short deadline, there will be a few bugs in this game. I don't intent to continue this project for now.
